Title: Crafting to Order
Description:
Hello, greetings, and welcome to the Crafter's Enclave.

According to Market Reeve Vokgret, we are now operating with the Artisan's Consortium to accommodate the needs of both the earthen and the outlanders.

Please speak to Ardran or Pordaz to view and place crafting orders.
ObjectivesText: Talk to Ardran in the Crafter's Enclave.
RewardText: These work orders are very useful. I am not sure how we did not think of them before the outlanders' arrival.
